marklogic.body: Hey Beet, wherever you are, you were Spot on about Flaherty! I bow down to your keen insight, because I had no clue this kid was this multi-dimensional. He will be great coming Off the bench. However, I'm not that confident about are starters. I know everybody is going bonkers about their performance but, once again, it's spring training guys. I think we need another good arm but hope I'm wrong. Really think the AL east and NL east are going to be a hoot. Once again we will be spoilers; however, sometime soon, we are going to compete and erase some of those 14 years of bad memories!
